CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 24, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "Old and Young Together - Grandmothers, as well as grandchildren had their day in Highland Park last Thursday afternoon when nearly one hundred of the city's aged residents gathered at the call of James E. East Missionary Circle of Ebenezer Baptist Church to enjoy the first picnic sponsored by the circle since the end of the war. In back row, left to right, are Mrs.Lena Hughes, Miss Anna Johnson, Mrs. Georgeanne Fitzgerald, president; Mrs. Lucy L. Holmes, general chairman, and two of the visitors. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of elderly man and women, posed with their grandchildren for picnic in Highland Park, sponsored by the James E. East Missionary Circle, with members, from left, back row: Lena Hughes, Anna Johnson, Georgeanne Fitzgerald, and Lucy L. Holmes
